meanings.sent1: After finishing his cookie, Tim decided to redips it in the milk for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: She redips her paintbrush in the water before continuing to paint.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally redips the same strawberry in the chocolate, creating a double-dipped treat.
meanings.sent4: The hiker had to redips his toe in the icy stream to soothe the pain.
meanings.sent5: The student had to redips his quill in the inkwell to finish writing the letter.

meanings.sent1: The redips of the apple in the caramel sauce made it even more delicious.
meanings.sent2: The redips of the fabric in the dye resulted in a darker shade.
meanings.sent3: The redips of the pretzel in the cheese sauce left a trail of drips on the table.
